course_description: Expands on didactic reasoning demonstrated throughout the curriculum in the area of the critical care patient. The student will become better prepared for examination, evaluation, intervention, coordination of care, and discharge planning for the ICU patient. This elective is for someone who has a passion for critical care and wants to continue to expand their clinical, didactic, and critical decision making for the critical care patient. Virtual with synchronous and asynchronous content; potential for in-person labs.
